channel.title: Do you dream about Black Mesa?
channel.description:
I know for a fact that I do. I've had at least half a dozen dreams so far where either the mod (or a demo) has been released.
Does anyone else have to deal with this?

item.title: Do you dream about Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I don’t dream about games… If you guys knew what I dream about your head would explode from being so scared. I’m not shitting you guys in the least bit. I one time locked my self in a closet and damn near shat myself when i woke up. Only time I remember dreaming about anything video game related was when I passed out after winning an all-nighter contest while playing HL2: Episode 1. In the dream Alyx tied me to a chair and punched me in the face with heated brass knuckles… (You may find that kinky if your a sick person untill you realise that prior to this Gordon Freeman shoved his crowbarunder my right collar bone and pryed it off like a door… WTF DID I DO!!!)

Read full topic
item.source: Do you dream about Black Mesa?

I know for a fact that I do. I’ve had at least half a dozen dreams so far where either the mod (or a demo) has been released.

Does anyone else have to deal with this?

I have dreams where im a charter in the game or that the game becomes real:|

item.title: Do you dream about Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: _amp_8706_lpha
item.description:
I once dreamt that Black Mesa got released and I was on the tram and then it broke down about halfway… so I thought meh I will restart and see what happens. This time the tram went down the wrong path to a dead end and stopped. I kept restarting trying to get to the platform at Sector C but I never made it because something kept getting in the way.
I was defo DISAPPOINT.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you dream about Black Mesa?

item.title: Do you dream about Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
Cusack:

tonight i dreamed about catzeye.
i love your red hair

:warm fuzzies: :3

I dreamt of hl2. I was scouting out and killing zombies and headcrabs in a delapidated garage while my husband kept watch over the kids.

Weird that I was the one to take point eh?

Read full topic

item.title: Do you dream about Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Vatz
item.description:
I had a dream where I was in the Black Mesa complex before, during, and after the invasion took place (got stuck inside when the nuke went off–it didn’t take out the whole facility, obviously). Finally got out and found that the Xen were invading the rest of Earth. Then it sort of took a “The Road” twist and ended up with me leading resistance members in N. America (near Canada).

Have I had a dream about Black Mesa (the mod) being released? No.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you dream about Black Mesa?

item.title: Do you dream about Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: blackout
item.description:
I dream about the following:

bugs,
cheese ,
flying,
south africa winning the world cup (odd this one, since I’m no football fan),
the third secret of fatima. . .
furry purple cartoon monsters chasing me,
suffocating in my sleep,
collosal futuristic war,
going up giant mountains on 80-degree angle cable cars,
giant tarantulas,
being kidnnapped and ritually sacrificed by Conan-esque barabrians,
thick black clouds,
dr who,

and many, many other weird things.

the closest half-life related dream was an appearence once by Alyx for some reason.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you dream about Black Mesa?

item.title: Do you dream about Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Mateuuuusz
item.description:
I dreamed…2 times.

At first time it was beta version. You was in Black Mesa but it looks totally different. You weren’t on tram, but above gulf. Whole black mesa was white.

At second dream i got black mesa source from my parents - gift. Everything was in old graphic, and you were only in one room.
